title: ui5.yaml
description: Schema for UI5 Tooling Configuration File (ui5.yaml)

specVersion.errorMessage:
Unsupported "specVersion"
Your UI5 CLI installation might be outdated.
Supported specification versions: "3.1", "3.0", "2.6", "2.5", "2.4", "2.3", "2.2", "2.1", "2.0", "1.1", "1.0", "0.1"
For details, see: https://sap.github.io/ui5-tooling/pages/Configuration/#specification-versions

name.title: Project Name
name.description: Unique identifier for the project, for example: organization.product.project
name.errorMessage: Not a valid project name. It must consist of lowercase alphanumeric characters, dash, underscore, and period only. Additionally, it may contain an npm-style package scope. For details, see: https://sap.github.io/ui5-tooling/stable/pages/Configuration/#name

resources-configuration-propertiesFileSo.title: Encoding of *.properties files
resources-configuration-propertiesFileSo.description: By default, the UI5 Tooling expects *.properties files to be UTF-8 encoded.

version.title: Version
version.description: Framework version to use in this project
version.errorMessage: Not a valid version according to the Semantic Versioning specification (https://semver.org/)

then.errorMessage: Either "development" or "optional" can be true, but not both

name.title: Extension Name
name.description: Unique identifier for the extension, for example: ui5-task-fearless-rock
name.errorMessage: Not a valid extension name. It must consist of lowercase alphanumeric characters, dash, underscore, and period only. Additionally, it may contain an npm-style package scope. For details, see: https://sap.github.io/ui5-tooling/stable/pages/Configuration/#name
